None.Name: Tainted Piercing
None.Description: 50% of all damage dealt by this unit cannot be warded off with the help of damage reducing abilities because it is able to circumvent every buff or protective shield.

None.Name: Life Stealer
None.Description: 15% of the damage dealt by the unit will be added to its life points.
